name: Adutt Diaper - pull up pants L size
description: Client is a divorcee mother with 2 young adult children. Client faces long term financial difficulties that mainly stems from paying hefty medical bill arrears for her elderly sick parents who are non-singapore citizens. As a result, client has filed for bankruptcy for this reason. Client also has outstanding house loan arrears. She is doing her best to clear the loans by taking multiple part time jobs. Due to her family circumstances, client has to shoulder financial responsibilities to pay for elderly parents monthly maintenance allowance. Client would appreciate if there are any kind donors willing to sponsor adult diapers to alleviate some of her financial burden.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: XL size - Tena Pull up diapers
description:
Client is an elderly lady in her 80s, living with dementia. 
Due to her frail condition, she requires pull-up diapers for her toileting. 

Family is a low-income family and is unable to cover the cost of her diapers.

name: Good And Sturdy Wheelchair (For Home Use)
description:
Client is a single mother of a teenager son. The mother and son resides in a 2 room HDB flat, and the single parent is unemployed due to complicating health issues. Being unemployed, client does not have additional savings and solely relies on kind donations (e.g., food rations) and SSO financial assistance for day to day necessities.
Due to her health condition, she is unable to walk and relies on a wheelchair to move around. As the current one has been worn out, she has kindly requested for a preloved item to replace the one that she has. 
Client is about 130kg , hence will need a sturdy wheelchair that can sustain her weight and move around in the house.
specifications: Client is 130kg, she will need a wheelchair that can sustain her weight. Thank you.

name: Wheelchair with elevated foot rest
description: Father is the sole breadwinner earning a low-income for the household of 4 living in government rental housing, with a young child diagnosed with special needs. The family is requesting for a wheelchair with elevated foot rest for grandfather who recently met with a traffic accident and is unable to rest well on the current donated wheelchair with fixed footrest.

contact.org: Fei Yue - Early Intervention Centre For Children
contact.name: Tessa Nai

name: Electric Scooter
description: Elderly man requires portable electronic scooter due to his legs being weakened  after decades of damage from kidney transport, swelling and also having blood clots.

name: PMD Mobility Scooter
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), Mdm S, is living alone in Ang Mo Kio Ave 4 and requires her daily usage of PMD to be mobile within the community. However, her PMD is wearing down and requires a repair or a replacement. As she has already utilised the SMF funding for her current PMD, she would not be eligible for a 2nd motorized device. 
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking either financial assistance in repairs or donation of a PMD.  
 
If you know of someone who can assist in either, please contact caseworker Anthony at 96546542 or anthony.wang@thkmc.org.sg. We would appreciate if the donor can deliver the item to the clientâ€™s place at Blk 257 Ang Mo Kio Avenue 4. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg .

contact.org: THK Cluster Support @ Ang Mo Kio
contact.name: Anthony Wang

name: motorize wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter
description: Elderly grandmother has multiple health issues and is unfit for work. She requires a 4-wheeled Mobility Scooter to get around and is hoping to get a secondhand one in good condition.

name: 4 wheeled Mobility Scooter
description:
Client is a 51yo man who has Parkinson's Disease and recently suffered a stroke. As a result of his medical illnesses, wife is currently the solebreadwinner for the family of 7 (3 children and 2 elderly parents). 
In a bid to alleviate some of wife's burden, client is currently looking for jobs and if successful, would require a 4-wheel mobility scooter to travel to work.

name: Fridge

description: Family of 3 with 2 school-going children require a front load washing machine. Their current washing machine is spoilt.

name: Wall Fan
description: Client has two school going children in Primary 5 and primary 3. Client and husband are unemployed due to health issues and client has to be his caregiver. Client lives in a 1 room/1 hall rental flat. Client sleeps at a bunk bed with her daughter. And as they do not have a wall fan, it gets very hot at night. Client requested for a wall fan. Also, as client has lack of funds, client hopes for donor to cover delivery charges.

name: Fridge
description: Family consists of 62 years old client who is wheelchair bound and on dialysis, her husband who is the sole breadwinner and 2 adults children. Her son has special needs and daughter is the main caregiver for client hence she is unable to work. Their fridge is spoilt and they are unable to keep raw food in the fridge. They would usually do cooking at home to reduce on the household expenses.

name: Front Load Washing Machine

name: Washing Machine

The family is facing financial strains as the wife lost her job due to coivd-19 and the husband has recently job transition to a lower-paying job. They are looking for a vertical iron/steamer however they are unable to afford it. It would be helpful for the family to receive one. Thank you!

name: Washing Machine
description:
An elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) Mr C was recently discharged from hospital due to a wound injury. He lives alone and his house is currently undergoing decluttering. His case worker has arranged for Home Personal Care, but his washing machine has broken down.  
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a washing machine, which will enable our Health Care Assistants to assist him in his laundry.  
     
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Case Worker Anthony Wang at 9654 6542. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to the clientâ€™s place at Ang Mo Kio Ave 5. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Fridge (Halal)
description:
This is a low-income family with 5 young children aged between 6 months old and 7 years of age. Father has been working hard as a security guard to provide for the family, however in the month of June and August his pay was cut due to shortened working hours due to covid.

Their fridge recently broke down and this will impact their food supplies given that they consume a lot of frozen food items. As the family is from a Muslim family, the family hopes to receive a Muslim owned fridge if is a used one. 

The assistance with a fridge will be greatly appreciate. Thank you! (Ruth)

Food Donation to Student Care @ Children's Society (Halal certified): Fresh milk, Condense milk, Tuna canned food, Baked beans and Ribena. Please contact us for delivery details. Email: dik@childrensociety.org.sg. Contact No.: 9436 7401. *Note: Delivery costs will be covered by donors. We appreciate your kind donation and generosity. Everyone can make a difference!

Thank you.

name: Request for TPG compatible mobile phone for elderly please
description:
Client is a 72 year old elderly who lives in rental housing. She is currently in between job and makes many calls for job search purposes. As a result, she has been topping up approximately $30-$40 a month to her prepaid card which is quite costly to her. She heard about TPG and has signed up for the $10 per month plan in hope to reduce her expenses. 

Her current phone is not TPG compatible. As such, she needs to use the TPG app to make calls, in which she has difficulty accessing which limits her call making.

Client hopes to be able to self-reliant and continue working as she is still in good general health. Hence, she hopes to have a TPG compatible phone which she is unable to afford due to her unemployment and limited savings. Thank you very much for your consideration and attention!

She lost her job and is also not able to continue working to provide for the family. Client is requesting for donations for a mobility scooter (including ramps to install at main door) to allow her to independently travel for her various and regular medical appointments and to purchase her own meals as her children are still schooling and often have difficulties accompanying her or purchase her meals on her behalf. This will also help client to regain some independence and alleviate some of her grief over the many losses she is experiencing.

name: 3-seater sofa
description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) currently sleeps on a wooden sofa bench without cushions, that has since broke in his living room.

   

On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a 3-seater sofa (non-fabric material, light-coloured) for the elderly to sleep on. Non-fabric material is preferred for easier maintenance. Light-coloured is for easier monitoring of pests (if any).

   

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to clientâ€™s home directly at Macpherson lane. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg
